title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy policy state that only a minimum of data is collected in order to Improve the performance and the security of the users and the server, data are shred regularly and will only be used if a cyber attack occurs which help to trace the attacker. We will always respect your privacy!

You are responsible of your action, if you send illegal content it will remain you the owner of this content.
